text:
H1 | Full-Stack Software Engineer | Onsite | New York | Full Time

Required Skills: React.Js, Typescript, SQL, AWS, Git Bonus Skills: Elasticsearch, D3.js

H1 was built by scientists for scientists. We empower stakeholders at healthcare and life science companies to make smarter scientific decisions by providing access to critical data through an intuitive interface.

Working with some of the largest and most influential global life science organizations, H1 provides insight into thought leaders, scholarly content, academics, and healthcare professionals with much more on the way.

More info here: http://h1insights.com Send Resumes to: zachary.feuerstein@h1insights.com
